createadminsession.name: CreateAdminSession
createadminsession.description: Grants permission to create and manage Wickr networks

createnetwork.name: CreateNetwork
createnetwork.description: Grants permission to create a new wickr network

deletenetwork.name: DeleteNetwork
deletenetwork.description: Grants permission to create a delete Wickr networks

listnetworks.name: ListNetworks
listnetworks.description: Grants permission to view Wickr networks

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags applied to a Wickr resource

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a specified wickr resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified tags from the specified wickr resource

updatenetworkdetails.name: UpdateNetworkDetails
updatenetworkdetails.description: Grants permission to update Wickr network details
